content: For me unlearning “getting really, really busy” would make a huge difference for me. In my world, there are so many things/people that require my attention that it’s hard for me to slow down at times. And when I do, I either feel guilty or in the back of my mind, I know there are still things that I need to do. I’m a mother of 4 children, a wife, and entrepreneur. So, it’s tough. I feel like I’m just waiting for the day that my children are older and more self sufficient, so things will be easier for me. But then, I feel guilt about feeling that way as well….such is life, I guess! I just do the best I can at the end of the day.
